screen_desc: The screen is the login page for a messaging application. It prompts users to enter their phone number or Facebook account to log in or create a new account. There are fields for email or phone number and password, along with options to log in, create an account, or recover a forgotten password.
action_think: The user wants to log in to Messenger Lite and select 'forgot password'. The current screen is the login page, so the next step is to click on the 'forgot password?' link.
action_result: The last action of clicking on the "FORGOT PASSWORD?" button has taken you to a new screen where you can select the app to open. This is a necessary step before you can proceed to log in and select the forgot password option. By clicking on the "FORGOT PASSWORD?" button, you have made progress towards your user request.
